Articles.Content:
Lets be honest, with the new update (0.21) we all want to make the chief air traffic controller spill his coffee...

The challenge is this, how much coffee can you make him spill?

Buzz the tower and screen shot your craft passing close by, your score (and the amount of coffee spilt) is dependent on your speed at time of passing. Simple as that! SCstock or not, I don't mind, its just a but of 0.21 fun.

Added rules reflect feedback:

- Craft but be runway launched, and runway landed. (With the hole craft intact and stoped on the tarmac)

- Rocket engines are banned (because y'know... topgun theme... )

- Hitting the tower, although would cause the greatest spilling of coffee, is not aloud.

- All players must first request a flyby and get the give the response "negative ghostrider, the pattern is full" (I'll take your word for it that you said it outloud )

- When passing the tower, the flight must me approximately level attitude, approximately inline with the windows, and as close as you can get to the tower. This pass criteria will be judges as fairly as possible by myself (I'm quite easy going:P )

- craft must me crewed, although there is no bonus for extra crew

- Parachutes are 100% banned, not even as a drogue for landing.

- Previous entries will be kept in a pre-alteration leader board

- Two screen shots are required, One of the flyby and one of the landed craft. Your score will be your speed in the screenshot passing the tower.
